credentials
  • Reference

A package to simplify gathering credentials from a user.

Use

The best way to ask for user credentials depends on the way in which the user is running R. For example, readline with hidden input works fine for users working in a terminal, but users of RStudio will have better luck using the RStudio API or a mini Shiny app. This package provides a layer of abstraction between package authors needing to collect credentials and user who have different preferences about how to use R. The package will interrogate the users R session to determine the best approach for collecting credentials, do the collection, and return the result to the caller in a consistent list structure.

Installation

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mitre/credentials")
